name: FeatureBorderGlow
description: CardStack feature section with animated glowing border effect that follows cursor/scroll.

description.example: Hover over each card to reveal the glowing border effect

buttonRules.note: Button variant is controlled by ThemeProvider's defaultButtonVariant.

featureRules.note: Array of feature cards. Each card displays icon at top, title and description below, with animated glowing border overlay.

glowEffect.desktop: Border glow tracks mouse movement with conic gradient mask following cursor angle within 64px proximity
glowEffect.mobile: Effect centers on viewport when card enters view on scroll
glowEffect.styling: Uses CSS variables (accent, background-accent) for theme-aware colors. Border width 1.5px with 40deg spread.

propsSchema.features: FeatureCard[] (required) - Array with icon, title, description
propsSchema.title: string

usageExample:
<ThemeProvider defaultButtonVariant="icon-arrow" borderRadius="rounded">
  <FeatureBorderGlow
    title="Powerful Features"
    description="Hover over each card to reveal the glowing border effect."
    tag="Features"
    tagIcon={Sparkles}
    textboxLayout="default"
    useInvertedBackground="none"
    animationType="fade"
    features={[
      { icon: Zap, title: "Fast Performance", description: "Lightning quick responses." },
      { icon: Shield, title: "Secure", description: "Enterprise-grade security." },
      { icon: Globe, title: "Global", description: "Available worldwide." }
    ]}
  />
</ThemeProvider>
do: Use for premium feature showcases with elegant visual polish
Each feature requires icon, title, and description
dont: Do not use for simple text-only feature lists
Do not use without icons for each feature
